channel.title: Slayer and pk points PLEASE help [PI]:
channel.description: okay so my slayer points work but i try and spend them in the slayer shop, and it doesnt work, it just says "you don't have enough slayer points" when i do. and in my funpk if you kill someone you get pkp. also, if you die in my mage arena you get 5 pkp can someone help me with these?
